Number Theory | Primitive roots modulo p -- Technical Lemma 1

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { a primitive } \\\n\text { sot modulo p } \\\n\text { s } \\\n\text { c } \frac{h}{a} a^{p-1} \neq 1\left(\bmod p^{2}\right)\n\end{array}[imath]\text { a primitive } [/imath] [imath]\text { sot modulo p } [/imath] [imath]\text { s } [/imath] [imath]\text { c } \frac{h}{a} a^{p-1} eq 1\left(\bmod p^{2}\right)[/imath]
